Modifications.Value: Turns a non-mechanical unit ethereal and slows its movement speed by <AHbn,DataA1,%>% for a short duration. Ethereal creatures cannot attack, but they can cast spells and certain spells cast upon them will have a greater effect. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - <AHbn,Cost1> mana, lasts <AHbn,Dur1>(3 for Heros) seconds. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - <AHbn,Cost2> mana, lasts <AHbn,Dur2>(5 for Heros) seconds. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - <AHbn,Cost3> mana, lasts <AHbn,Dur3>(7 for Heros) seconds. |n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - <AHbn,Cost4> mana, lasts <AHbn,Dur4>(9 for Heros) seconds.

Turns a non-mechanical unit ethereal and slows its movement speed by <AHbn,DataA1,%>% for <AHbn,Dur1>(3 for Heros) seconds. Ethereal creatures cannot attack, but they can cast spells and certain spells cast upon them will have a greater effect.

Turns a non-mechanical unit ethereal and slows its movement speed by <AHbn,DataA2,%>% for <AHbn,Dur2>(5 for Heros) seconds. Ethereal creatures cannot attack, but they can cast spells and certain spells cast upon them will have a greater effect.

Turns a non-mechanical unit ethereal and slows its movement speed by <AHbn,DataA3,%>% for <AHbn,Dur3>(7 for Heros) seconds. Ethereal creatures cannot attack, but they can cast spells and certain spells cast upon them will have a greater effect.

Turns a non-mechanical unit ethereal and slows its movement speed by <AHbn,DataA4,%>% for <AHbn,Dur4>(9 for Heros) seconds. Ethereal creatures cannot attack, but they can cast spells and certain spells cast upon them will have a greater effect.
